mean_cn: adj. 非常规的，不按照习惯【惯例】的，不落陈套的
mean_en: very different from the things that are used or accepted by most people :not traditional or usual :not conventional
word_etyma: un 不+convention惯例，传统+al ...的→unconventional非传统的
sentence: Unconventional thinking has led to a lot of great inventions.
sentence_trans: 打破常规的思维已经带来了许多的伟大发明。
